item.description:
This will be our third January cooking club and the second anniversary of our group. The theme is comfort food.

Our core group is very comfortable with one another and newbies are always brought right into the action and fun.

We are going to be at Paul and Angela's new home this month so it is a change of venue. I will send out address, parking instructions and directions the Wednesday before the event.

Paul and Angela's new home is very comfortable and welcoming (and bigger than my place).

Please plan to cook on site unless your recipe takes more than 45 minutes to prepare. Do your prep work ahead of time if you like and assemble and cook on site.

Please bring what you would like to drink and share as well.

Thank you to all the great members of this meetup who have made the past two years so fun and memorable! I treasure the friendships that have formed and the good company every month.

See you in January at Paul's!
item.name: The Hartford Cooking And Recipes January Meetup
